questions.question: Which of the following pencil is used to draw construction lines

explanations.a: 3H pencil is hard and gives light lines ideal for construction work.

questions.question: Which pencil is used to draw visible projections?

explanations.d: 2H pencil is slightly dark and sharp, suitable for drawing visible projections.

questions.question: Which pencil is used for drawing dark and prominent lines?

explanations.b: HB pencil provides a medium-dark tone suitable for clearly visible lines.
